title: Why did Psy's Gangnam Style go viral? - Quora

response.answer_text: Pre-Launch Campaign  Large platform to initiate the campaign which included 2.5m subscribers on Youtube, unknown number of e-mail database but likely to be millions.Seeding Platforms were organically grown, not games.Video was catchy, shareable, crossed social, economic and language boundaries (humour, colourful).Video had topical people alongside Psy. Dancing kid from Korea’s Got Talent and two comedians/entertainers. Gave it “home appeal’ in South Korea.Execution of the Campaign  Placed video online and seeded via their own established and engaged audiences.High impact first day– 500k of video views.Immediate number one in home charts (South Korean).This brought it to Western audiences via people who look for Eastern trends to report on, e.g. Billboard.comTeased the campaign to key media before launch.Keeping the buzz alive  Organic media pick up started to grow one month after launch.Billboard made it mainstream (controversial write up caused debate and a rise in awareness).Huff Post ran a story, little visual impact on search and tweet volumes but may have triggered CNN TV piece - http://huff.to/UGJdkB & http://bit.ly/UGJJzh.CNN caused huge spike & this triggered YouTube Trends to write story on Gangnam Style being video of the month 'Gangnam Style' is Your International Hit of the Month.Daily Mail demonstrated its ability to spot emerging search trends and piggy back by writing 9 (nine) articles about Psy/Gangnam Style.This is the time (relatively late stage) that Celeb tweets came in e.g. Katy Perry (13k RTs).Mainstream media got on board: Mashable, Time Mag, Economist.Psy signed to Scooter Braun, Justin Bieber’s manager!Scooter's influence and marketing database triggers the biggest spike of the campaign. Britney tweets, Ellen TV show appearances, MTV Award appearances.Growth slowed and Scooter got Psy on NBC Today show. Guinness was the final push, as Gangnam video breaks world records for views/likes.Ending the Campaign  As search and tweet volumes declined, media appearance requests for Psy increased, showing how many media were late to the story.He has secured deals with several high profile companies.Psy traveled around the world servicing media requests and handled each one professionally.  Source: How Did Gangnam Style Go Viral? The Viral Marketing Playbook
